item.title: Europe balks at ‘unbalanced’ U.S. trade deal
item.description: The U.S. and EU on Sunday announced a trade agreement, including a 15% tariff rate.

item.title: Massie warns blocking Epstein vote in the House could be political liability for GOP in midterms
item.description: The lawmaker's comments underscore the divisions within the Republican Party over the files relating to Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Trump announces EU trade deal with 15% tariffs
item.description: President Donald Trump and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen met for a pivotal discussion before Trump's Aug 1. tariff deadline.

item.title: U.S. and China to resume tariff talks on Monday in effort to extend truce
item.description: Senior , U.S. and Chinese negotiators meet in Stockholm on Monday, aiming to extend a truce keeping sharply higher tariffs at bay.

item.title: Lutnick: U.S. to release result of probe into chip imports in two weeks
item.description: The Trump administration will announce results of a national security probe into imports of semiconductors in two weeks, Commerce Secretary Howard Lut...
